text:
<start_of_turn>user
What was my last status update?<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
Your most recent update mentioned feeling tired with a mild headache (3/10 severity).<end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user
Any recent health notes?<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
Last recorded: fatigue and tension headache lasting 4 hours, relieved by rest.<end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user
Summarize my recent state<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
Pattern: intermittent headaches (2-3/week) with associated tiredness.<end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user
How bad was it last time?<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
Peak discomfort: 5/10 headache, managed with hydration and dark room.<end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user
What symptoms did I report?<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
Primary symptoms: frontal head pain, photophobia, and reduced stamina.<end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user
Have I felt better recently?<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
No improvement logged - last 3 reports show consistent headache patterns.<end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user
When was my worst episode?<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
Most severe: 48 hours ago (7/10 pain, nausea, 12-hour duration).<end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user
Any positive changes?<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
Your sleep quality improved 20% despite persistent headaches.<end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user
Compare last two reports<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
Previous: 6/10 headache. Current: 3/10 with longer recovery time.<end_of_turn>

<start_of_turn>user
Did I take meds last time?<end_of_turn>
<start_of_turn>model
Record shows 400mg ibuprofen at onset, with partial relief.<end_of_turn>
